Summary Note:
The RM met Anna Ilaria Livi during a business conference in Rome. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Anna Ilaria Livi is a 63 year old retired Maritime Industry Leader from Italy. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Anna Ilaria Livi is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Anna earned her secondary school diploma from Liceo Scientifico Leonardo da Vinci Milano in 1980.
Anna finished her studies at John Cabot University in 1986.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 40 years, Anna Ilaria Livi brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
In 1985, Anna Ilaria Livi started working as a Ship Broker at Grimaldi Group S.p.A., marking the beginning of her successful career.
At MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company S.A., she held the position of Shipping Company Owner from 1990 to 1992, making significant contributions to the organization.
She spent 3 years working as a Fleet Manager at MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company S.A., refining her expertise and building a strong network.
In 1997, she transitioned to Costa Crociere S.p.A. to take on the position of Maritime Industry Leader, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 1040000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has condo located in Milan, worth 721000 EUR.

She purchased flat in Pisa, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 580000 EUR.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
